body: Most of my political views hinge upon this assertion, so please challenge it.
body_html: Most of my political views hinge upon this assertion, so please challenge it.
title: IQ is mostly hereditary.

body:
Honestly, I don't think I can refute the "IQ is hereditary" view since genetics plays a huge part in it. However, as someone whose been told constantly that he's a genius IRL, I can tell you that high intelligence is not all it's cracked up to be.

IQ tests don't take things into account like executive functioning, or your ability to sort and organize. This is a critical thing. Not to mention that if you look at some of the people who are publicly part of Mensa, you'll see that a good number have perfectly normal jobs. That's not even touching on how people with higher intelligence are more likely to have mental disorders. 

A good work ethic, determination, and simple ability to follow directions goes a long way. I've seen it in action. Or put simply, it's not simply your IQ; it's how you can use it.
body_html:

IQ tests don't take things into account like executive functioning, or your ability to sort and organize. This is a critical thing. Not to mention that if you look at some of the people who are publicly part of Mensa, you'll see that a good number have perfectly normal jobs. That's not even touching on how people with higher intelligence are more likely to have mental disorders.

A good work ethic, determination, and simple ability to follow directions goes a long way. I've seen it in action. Or put simply, it's not simply your IQ; it's how you can use it.

post.title: IQ is mostly hereditary.

body:
political views hinge on this? 

why? Why does politics and biology have to do with one another.  
Your views are just shaped by your environment.  What you watch and read and who you keep company with.  

So where does IQ meet policy views?  

Anyway,

IQ can be hereditary as in if two retards make a baby the baby is gonna be retarded. Then there's all the cognitive disabilities people have that can impair learning.

But the biggest take away here is that IQ is based on the median of the of a population.  It would appear the median is lower than ever based on how little critical thinking people can do regarding issues that take some historical context and factors to consider.  if you think taking down statues is cowardly and  dumb then you're probably a 100 iq and that would make me a 300 iq.  So that's cool for me, but bad for the country.
body_html:
political views hinge on this?

why? Why does politics and biology have to do with one another. Your views are just shaped by your environment. What you watch and read and who you keep company with.

So where does IQ meet policy views?

Anyway,

IQ can be hereditary as in if two retards make a baby the baby is gonna be retarded. Then there's all the cognitive disabilities people have that can impair learning.

But the biggest take away here is that IQ is based on the median of the of a population. It would appear the median is lower than ever based on how little critical thinking people can do regarding issues that take some historical context and factors to consider. if you think taking down statues is cowardly and dumb then you're probably a 100 iq and that would make me a 300 iq. So that's cool for me, but bad for the country.

post.title: IQ is mostly hereditary.

body: Simply put, if stupid people reproduce and smart people do not, humanity becomes stupider on average. This relates to welfare (subsidizing the survival and reproduction of the stupid), mass/replacement immigration (flooding high IQ countries with low IQ people), feminism (dissuading high IQ people from reproducing, including via propagation of birth control), global warming (driving low IQ people who evolved in hot climates northward, to colder high IQ areas), and censorship (the chilling effect in academia on this topic).
body_html: Simply put, if stupid people reproduce and smart people do not, humanity becomes stupider on average. This relates to welfare (subsidizing the survival and reproduction of the stupid), mass/replacement immigration (flooding high IQ countries with low IQ people), feminism (dissuading high IQ people from reproducing, including via propagation of birth control), global warming (driving low IQ people who evolved in hot climates northward, to colder high IQ areas), and censorship (the chilling effect in academia on this topic).

body:
For some reason I get the feeling that when you say "stupid people" in this comment you really mean something else.

Anyway, those people aren't dumb, they're just very foolish and don't use their intelligence. Stopping them from reproducing isn't going to fix that, as that is an acquired trait and can't be hereditary. Even if it were, the way genes work doesn't mean that two smart or two stupid parents will necessarily give their children the same trait.
body_html:

Anyway, those people aren't dumb, they're just very foolish and don't use their intelligence. Stopping them from reproducing isn't going to fix that, as that is an acquired trait and can't be hereditary. Even if it were, the way genes work doesn't mean that two smart or two stupid parents will necessarily give their children the same trait.

body: Honestly, I don't think there's anyone who's naturally smarter. There are some people with learning disabilities and such but all the "gifted" people I've ever seen just became super obsessed with a particular interest at one point and are very knowledgeable and skilled at it as a result. They're no better at things in general than anyone else. I feel like the idea that you can't acquire new knowledge or skills is a lie to get people to become dependent on the government and welfare.

post.body: Most of my political views hinge upon this assertion, so please challenge it.
post.body_html: Most of my political views hinge upon this assertion, so please challenge it.
post.title: IQ is mostly hereditary.

body:
I don't blame you for thinking that, as the two variables are so heavily correlated as to be nearly indistinguishable. A -0.92 correlation between skin color and IQ would be high enough in any other psych subfield to be used as a proxy, but due to the chilling effect it isn't.
https://www.researchgate.net/publication/222557129_Temperature_skin_color_per_capita_income_and_IQ_An_international_perspective

As to your latter comment, you seem to think that everyone is born with the same intelligence but some are just lazy. I would ask whether you believe in evolution, and whether you would expect that everyone is born with the same capabilities in any other facet. I think it follows naturally from evolution that evolutionary pressures cause different aptitudes, so why is intelligence an exception?

body:
> I don't blame you for thinking that, as the two variables are so heavily correlated as to be nearly indistinguishable. A -0.92 correlation between skin color and IQ would be high enough in any other psych subfield to be used as a proxy, but due to the chilling effect it isn't. https://www.researchgate.net/publication/222557129_Temperature_skin_color_per_capita_income_and_IQ_An_international_perspective

I didn't think that because of the correlation. I thought that because the way you worded is sounds like a common talking point for you people. Even if it were true, why on Earth do you think being less intelligent is a good reason to exterminate somebody? It doesn't mean they're evil. You just hate black people the same way SJWs hate white people.

> As to your latter comment, you seem to think that everyone is born with the same intelligence but some are just lazy. I would ask whether you believe in evolution, and whether you would expect that everyone is born with the same capabilities in any other facet. I think it follows naturally from evolution that evolutionary pressures cause different aptitudes, so why is intelligence an exception?

I actually don't believe in evolution. But that's beside the point, as I have observed little natural intelligence differences in anybody, evolution or not. The big difference is how it's put to use. Obviously the nerds are good at academics because they study all the time. Gamers are good at video games because they play them all the time. Some people are good with computers because they experiment with them all the time. Furries are good at art because they spend 25 hours per day drawing yiff. The manager or entrepreneur is good at business because they do it a lot. Writers are good at writing because they're always thinking about stories. The stupid people are either not interested in anything, suffer a lack of motivation, or are just plain lazy. There are some people with real learning disabilities, although I see that as a separate issue that makes it more difficult to use your intelligence. I have yet to see anyone actually gifted with higher intelligence. It's always about focus, time, and level of interest. I don't think people are just born with a different amount of knowledge than others, it's acquired.

Even if it were true, why on Earth do you think being less intelligent is a good reason to exterminate somebody? It doesn't mean they're evil. You just hate black people the same way SJWs hate white people.

As to your latter comment, you seem to think that everyone is born with the same intelligence but some are just lazy. I would ask whether you believe in evolution, and whether you would expect that everyone is born with the same capabilities in any other facet. I think it follows naturally from evolution that evolutionary pressures cause different aptitudes, so why is intelligence an exception?

I actually don't believe in evolution. But that's beside the point, as I have observed little natural intelligence differences in anybody, evolution or not. The big difference is how it's put to use. Obviously the nerds are good at academics because they study all the time. Gamers are good at video games because they play them all the time. Some people are good with computers because they experiment with them all the time. Furries are good at art because they spend 25 hours per day drawing yiff. The manager or entrepreneur is good at business because they do it a lot. Writers are good at writing because they're always thinking about stories. The stupid people are either not interested in anything, suffer a lack of motivation, or are just plain lazy. There are some people with real learning disabilities, although I see that as a separate issue that makes it more difficult to use your intelligence. I have yet to see anyone actually gifted with higher intelligence. It's always about focus, time, and level of interest. I don't think people are just born with a different amount of knowledge than others, it's acquired.

body: I never mentioned extermination, so not sure where that came from. I do think the long term effect of the stupid outbreeding the smart is very grim for humanity for obvious reasons. This should be solved by ending welfare programs (stop supporting their bad behavior) and addressing the social climate (feminism) that leads intelligent women not to meet replacement rate.

body:
Then its dumb people making dumb people because they don't have any knowledge or positive traits to pass on. correct. 
Maybe you're confusing perceived negative traits as a measure of intelligence.  

Then this might mean if you had a child and in the off chance they respected you, they may carry on your beliefs.  Which are without any citation. and mainly bias based on what sounds like mostly white supremacy ideals and beliefs.  aka alt right.  

By my assessment it would make the children you raise = 'dumb' (if they carried on your beliefs).

parent.body: Simply put, if stupid people reproduce and smart people do not, humanity becomes stupider on average. This relates to welfare (subsidizing the survival and reproduction of the stupid), mass/replacement immigration (flooding high IQ countries with low IQ people), feminism (dissuading high IQ people from reproducing, including via propagation of birth control), global warming (driving low IQ people who evolved in hot climates northward, to colder high IQ areas), and censorship (the chilling effect in academia on this topic).
parent.body_html: Simply put, if stupid people reproduce and smart people do not, humanity becomes stupider on average. This relates to welfare (subsidizing the survival and reproduction of the stupid), mass/replacement immigration (flooding high IQ countries with low IQ people), feminism (dissuading high IQ people from reproducing, including via propagation of birth control), global warming (driving low IQ people who evolved in hot climates northward, to colder high IQ areas), and censorship (the chilling effect in academia on this topic).

body:
IQ predicts societal success - if too much of your population is below 90, it will fail - there will be no peace, it will not be wealthy, and it will never make it to space. 

We're not allowed to say success in general because "success is subjective" - which is what people say to try and control the conversation.
body_html:
IQ predicts societal success - if too much of your population is below 90, it will fail - there will be no peace, it will not be wealthy, and it will never make it to space.

We're not allowed to say success in general because "success is subjective" - which is what people say to try and control the conversation.
